Texts.Chs: <译文: ^red;<未知>^reset;的和^red;<未知>^reset;的已经在尼亚拉博伊地区开战了。看起来，^red;<未知>^reset;似乎对我们最近与维洛林人的贸易感到不满，但确信是^red;<未知>^reset;促成了这笔交易。它们从来都不是聪明的物种。>
Texts.Eng: <Translation: ^red;<unknown>^reset; and ^red;<unknown>^reset; have begun war in the Nyallapoi sector. It seems that the ^red;<unknown>^reset; are displeased about our recent trade with the Velorin, but are convinced it was the ^red;<unknown>^reset; that brokered the deal. They have never been a bright species.>
